message.content:
```python
def transform(sequence):
    sequence = list(sequence)
    sequence_unique = sorted(list(set(sequence)))
    mapping = dict(zip(sequence_unique, range(len(sequence_unique))))

    transformed_sequence = [str(mapping[x]) for x in sequence]
    return ''.join(transformed_sequence)
```

```python
def transform(sequence):
    sequence = list(sequence)
    sequence_unique = sorted(list(set(sequence)))
    mapping = dict(zip(sequence_unique, range(len(sequence_unique))))

    transformed_sequence = [str(mapping[x]) for x in sequence]
    return ''.join(transformed_sequence)
```
